about_the_game:
Despite being the last witch, Violet could’t cast a spell to save her life. She accidentally disrupts the magical balance of the universe, unleashing her magical powers, but she steals them from the God of the spiritual realm. Whether he likes it or not, the Owl god is forced to help Violet. Join them on this misadventure or dare I say this “Unfortunate Tale”... Fight inquisitors and surprise guests who are after the same goal as her.

Explore spellbinding environments

The vast world of Unfortunate Tales of Violet is filled with places to explore. Immerse yourself in the entrancingly beautiful scenery and find out what secrets lie beneath the soil.

Master the art of spell-casting

|
Get creative by combining your spells. Get even more creative by combining the spells you've combined! Create charms and potions with the herbs you collect. Find effective strategies to defeat enemies. Hop on your broom and restore the balance of magic.

short_description: Feel like an actual witch by DRAWING runes in real-time to cast spells. Unfold the story of a world filled with dark humor and absurdity. Join Violet to fix the chaos she’s caused with her owl “friend” that never misses a chance to rub that in her face.
